name: SendEmailError

methods.name: getFields
methods.description: A list of one or more field names. Identifies which fields in the object, if any, affected the error condition.

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: The text of the error message.

methods.name: getStatusCode
methods.description: Returns a code that characterizes the error.

methods.name: getTargetObjectId
methods.description: The ID of the target record for which the error occurred.

description: Represents an error that the SendEmailResult object may contain.
